question: Can you book diversion routes in SM?
answer: This is outslide the scope of Street Manager. There are products on the market that provide this functionality. There is no point in Street Manager trying to do many things badly. We need to focus on doing our core product well and leaving space for third parties to operate in the sector.

question: Can we plot section 58s?
answer: The long term solution to this is for GeoPlace to enable change only updates to the NSG. The DfT is working with the group re-writing the Code of Practise to ensure this important area runs smoothly.
